tool_description: Get access to real-time data on all major cryptocurrencies, including ratings, red flags, trending analytics, community metrics and more.
name: Is This Coin A Scam
title: Is This Coin A Scam

api_list.name: Get a list of latest profiles
api_list.description: Get a list of the top 100 crypto projects added to on isthiscoinascam.com. Ordered by date added.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://is-this-coin-a-scam.p.rapidapi.com/top/latest"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "is-this-coin-a-scam.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

slug.description: the unique string identifier of the platform

api_list.name: Get profile by slug
api_list.description: Get a specific coin profile by slug

optional_parameters.name: explorers
optional_parameters.description: 'true' if you want to display the list of explorers

optional_parameters.name: community
optional_parameters.description: 'true' if you want to display the community metrics related to this coin

optional_parameters.name: repo
optional_parameters.description: 'true' if you want to display the source code repo stats related to this coin

optional_parameters.name: contracts
optional_parameters.description: 'true' if you want to display the smart contracts and audit data related to this coin

optional_parameters.name: news
optional_parameters.description: 'true' if you want to display the latest 5 news stories related to this coin

optional_parameters.name: flags
optional_parameters.description: 'true' if you want to display the red flags related to this coin

optional_parameters.name: exchanges
optional_parameters.description: 'true' if you want to display the list of exchanges

optional_parameters.name: links
optional_parameters.description: 'true' if you want to display the link to social media and project websites and artifacts

optional_parameters.name: tags
optional_parameters.description: 'true' if you want to display the tags related to this coin

data.name: Bitcoin
data.description: The first line of the Bitcoin white paper, written by the anonymous creator Satoshi Nakamoto, reads, “A purely peer-to-peer version of electronic cash, which would allow online payments to be sent directly from one party to another without going through a financial institution.” Bitcoin launched on Jan. 3, 2009, launching the cryptocurrency revolution. Bitcoin is a purely decentralized digital currency, confirming transactions on its own blockchain, which makes it unlike any other asset that came before it.

slug.description: the unique string identifier of the coin/token in profile

name.description: the name of the coin/token in profile

symbol.description: the symbol of the coin/token in profile

type.description: the type of cryptocurrency project e.g. token or coin

icon.description: a url to the logo for the project

genesis_at.description: the date of the first transaction on its blockchain

capsize.description: the market cap size of the project

category.description: the primary category of the project

style.description: the behaviour style of the project

title.description: the title of the score of the project

marketcap_rank.description: the market cap rank of the project

percentage.description: the percentage score of the project

platform.description: if the project is a token then display the plaform details

slug.description: the unique string identifier of the platform

community.description: community metrics such as voting and trending stats

moon.description: the overall percentage of moon votes as rated by the community

amazing.description: the overall percentage of amazing votes as rated by the community

good.description: the overall percentage of good votes as rated by the community

ok.description: the overall percentage of ok votes as rated by the community

shit.description: the overall percentage of shit votes as rated by the community

scam.description: the overall percentage of scam votes as rated by the community

bull.description: the overall percentage of bullish votes as rated by the community

bear.description: the overall percentage of bearish votes as rated by the community

is_trending.description: has this coin trended over the last 24 hours

top_watched.description: Is this coin in the top 100 of watched coins?

name.description: the name of the code repository account

status.description: the status of the code repository account

repo_type.description: The type of code repository account either organization or user

avatar_url.description: The url of the accounts avatar

total_repos.description: The number of repos in this account

last_commit_at.description: The timestamp of the last commit

total_fork_count.description: The total number of code repositories forked from this accounts repos

total_watcher_count.description: The total number users watching this account

total_stargazer_count.description: The total number of stars awarded to this account

last_28_day_commit_count.description: The total number commits occurred in the last 28 days

total_vulnerability_count.description: The total number of vulnerabilities reported in the accounts code

total_mentionable_user_count.description: The total number of mentionable users who have contributed to this accounts code

chat.description: a list of chat related platforms and apps

link.description: the url of the chat website

text.description: the link text of the chat website

forum.description: a list of forum related websites

link.description: the url of the forum website

text.description: the link text of the forum website

social.description: a list of social media links

link.description: the url of the social media account

text.description: the link text of the social media account

source.description: a list of source repository accounts

link.description: the url of the source repository account

text.description: the link text of the source repository account

project.description: a list of urls related the project team, whitepaper or homepage

link.description: the url of the projects weblink

text.description: the link text of the projects weblink

website.description: a list of websites related to the project

text.description: the link text of the website
the link text of the exchanges
the link text of the explorer

features.description: a list tags to describe features of the token/coin

keywords.description: a list tags to keywords about this project

consensus.description: a list of consensus tags about this project

portfolios.description: a list of portfolios this project appears in

ecosystems.description: a list of ecosystems this project is related to

news.description: a list of the latest news about this project

title.description: the title of the new article

url.description: the url of the news article

author.description: the author of the news article

source.description: the source of the news article

published_at.description: the date the news article was pusblished

contracts.description: a list of the contracts related to this project

slug.description: the unique string identifier of the platform

is_primary.description: Is this the smart contract of the primary platform?

url.description: the unique string identifier of the platform

critical.description: the total number of critical flags

major.description: the total number of major flags

medium.description: the total number of medium flags

minor.description: the total number of minor flags

authority.description: the authority that performed the audit

flags.description: a list of the red flags related to this project

api_list.name: Get a list of trending profiles
api_list.description: Get a list of the top 100 crypto projects currently trending on isthiscoinascam.com added to the site. Ordered by most popular first.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://is-this-coin-a-scam.p.rapidapi.com/top/trending"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "is-this-coin-a-scam.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get coin by slug
api_list.description: Get a specific coin by slug
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://is-this-coin-a-scam.p.rapidapi.com/coins/bitcoin"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "is-this-coin-a-scam.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://is-this-coin-a-scam.p.rapidapi.com/coins/{slug}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

        }

print(response.json())

slug.description: the unique string identifying slug of the coin

api_list.name: List all platforms
api_list.description: Get a list of platforms. You can search slug, name and symbol. You can perform wildcard searches

optional_parameters.name: symbol
optional_parameters.description: search all platform symbolds. Wildcard searches can be performed by using the * character e.g. symbol=*TH. You can search for more than one item at a time by sending a comma seperated list e.g. symbol=TOK,*TH

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: limit the number of records returned

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: search all platform names. Wildcard searches can be performed by using the * character e.g. name=*platform. You can search for more than one item at a time by sending a comma seperated list e.g. name=ethereum,*token

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: the page number which to start from

optional_parameters.name: slug
optional_parameters.description: search all platform slugs. Wildcard searches can be performed by using the * character e.g. slug=*token. You can search for more than one item at a time by sending a comma seperated list e.g. slug=ethereum,*token

slug.description: the unique string identifier of the platform

records.description: the number of records displayed in the response

total.description: the total number of records available to page

page.description: the number of the current page we are viewing

limit.description: the number records displayed per page

api_list.name: List all coins
api_list.description: Get a list of coins. You can search slug, name and symbol. You can perform wildcard searches

optional_parameters.name: symbol
optional_parameters.description: search all coin symbols. Wildcard searches can be performed by using the * character e.g. symbol=*BTC. You can search for more than one item at a time by sending a comma seperated list e.g. symbol=BTC,*TH

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: search all coin names. Wildcard searches can be performed by using the * character e.g. name=*coin. You can search for more than one item at a time by sending a comma seperated list e.g. name=bitcoin,*eth

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: the page number which to start from

optional_parameters.name: slug
optional_parameters.description: search all coin slugs. Wildcard searches can be performed by using the * character e.g. slug=*coin. You can search for more than one item at a time by sending a comma seperated list e.g. slug=bitcoin,*eth

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: limit the number of records returned

slug.description: the unique string identifying slug of the coin

records.description: the number of records displayed in the response

total.description: the total number of records available to page

page.description: the number of the current page we are viewing

limit.description: the number records displayed per page
